  • Constructor Details

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int size, String sauce)
      Constructor of the pizza class which has a constructor chaining and it will call the other constructor
      Parameters:
      size - is the size of the pizza in Inches
      sauce - is the type of the sauce of the pizza

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int size, double basePrice)
      this is the constructor of the pizza class
      Parameters:
      size - is the size of the pizza in Inches
      basePrice - is the base price of the chosen pizza

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this Pizza object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the class name of this object, along with its attributes including size, type of sauce, crust type, topping, topping count, and base price.
